src.models.sentiment_analysis.test package

src.models.sentiment_analysis.test.predict module

This module contains predict_sentiment function that does sentiment prediction.

src.models.sentiment_analysis.test.predict.predict_sentiment(df, model_name='BERT')

Predict the sentiment for df.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – dataframe to predict

  • model_name (str, optional) – model to run for prediction. Default is the model specified in config file.

Returns:

dataframe (pd.Dataframe) – prediction result dataframe
